title: Minecraft 1.4 [ Preprerelease 8.5 ] 12w42b - JKoop
description:
HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the next snapshot, 12w42b! We are pushing these very rapidly now because we need to get ready for the 1.4 pre-release (which needs to be out before the official release on October 24). Since yesterdayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s snapshot weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve doneÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

1.Falling sand now properly Ã¢â‚¬Å“popsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ when falling on non-solid blocks (such as torches)
2.The redstone repeater lock mechanism is now slightly more stable / predictable. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s still not 100% as we want it, but fixing it completely will require bigger changes that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve planned for Minecraft 1.5.

---------------------------------------------------------

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS 


Windows- 

1. Type %appdata% in the search bar 

2. .minecraft/bin

3. Drag/Copy the new minecraft.jar file into /bin folder and replace it.

4. Make a new folder named "server" .minecraft/server in that folder drag/copy the minecraft_server.jar file 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAC - 

1. goto Finder/User/Library/Application Support/minecraft 

2. FOLLOW STEPS 2-4 above.
